content: We started to offer our VCC services globally.You can contact me for detailed information.All our cards are virtual cards derived from quality credit cards.There are no illegal events.All cards are owned by me.It supports 3D Verification.Ready Purchases-------------------Nitro Plus 1 Year : 18$Nitro Classic 1 Year : 10$Nitro Plus Monthly : 3$Nitro Classic Monthly : 2$3TL for Steam : $1Disney+ Custom 1 Year : 40$Spotify Personal 1 Year : 20$Crunchyroll 1 Year : 25$TURKEY VCC ( VISA-MASTERCARD )--------------Card Fee: 1$Loading Fee: %10USA VCC ( VISA )----------Card Fee: 3$Loading Fee: %10Telegram: @raidenshogunofficialPayment Method: Crypto Currency ( Network Transfer ) - Binance PayT.O.S------- Our cards are 100% legal and not allowed to be used for illegal transactions.- Our cards are accepted at all workplaces with the VISA-MASTERCARD logo. If the merchant does not process your payment, we are not responsible for it.- If you cannot buy and use the card even though there is no VISA-MASTERCARD logo at the workplace where you will shop, no refund will be provided.- Crypro Transfer fees belong to the buyer.- Our Turkey cards remain active for 1 hour. Our USA Cards remain active for 24 hours. We are not responsible for cards not used within the specified time.- The usage period of the cards can be increased for an additional fee.Do you need monthly rental cards?so contact now
